name: media-picker
description: Javascript library to capture or pick images and or audio from your PC

scripts.build: browserify js/app.js > js/build.js -t [babelify --presets [es2015] ] && uglify -s js/build.js -o js/build.min.js && watchify js/app.js -o js/build.min.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [es2015] ]

author: Diego R.
